thread.title: No cable connectivity available at new apartment
thread.title_full: No cable connectivity available at new apartment

author: Dominh
title: No cable connectivity available at new apartment
text:
Frage
Antwort
Lösung
30.08.2024 16:53 - bearbeitet 30.08.2024 16:54
Hi experts,
I will be moving from Mannheim to Biblis in 3 months (just received my confirmation from landlord regarding my cancellation).
I have a Cable gigazuhause 100GB contract with Vodafone that runs till May 2025.
However, when I checked the availability of cable internet at my new address, it's confirmed to be unavailable (only DSL).
I don't want DSL connection though because it's slower for higher price usually. And also my friend who I move in with is already having an existing internet in the apartment.
I can share further details when it's required.
In this case can I cancel prematurely the contract without further payment under Sonderkündigungsrecht?
I tried to request cancellation of my contract through formular, but not sure if I'm eligible, and if I should upload any further documents (there is no attachment function there) - like my new rental contract at new apartment, my cancellation confirmation of current apartment, ...
If possible, could you help me process this request?
Thank you.
BR
Do Le
am 30.08.2024 17:22
Use the relocation service
Mit Vodafone umziehen | Hilfe und Anleitung
If additional information is required you will be informed.
There is no support in the forums.
If you need assistance in english you have to use
